snippet: An official with Star Mine Operations said the accident in the southwestern Colorado town of Ouray involved a release of chemicals and was not related to a cave-in or mine collapse.
abstract: Two workers are killed and 20 others are injured in a mining accident near the southwestern Colorado town of Ouray; an official with Star Mine Operations says the accident involved a release of chemicals and was not related to a cave-in or mine collapse.
lead_paragraph: An official with Star Mine Operations said the accident in the southwestern Colorado town of Ouray involved a release of chemicals and was not related to a cave-in or mine collapse.

headline.main: 2 Dead and 20 Hurt in Colorado Mine Accident
headline.print_headline: 2 Dead and 20 Hurt in Colorado Mine Accident
